artifact.title: Paywall Experiment (PS-EXP-001)
artifact.summary: 14-day experiment removing free tier to test conversion impact

sections.heading: Overview
sections.content:

sections.heading: Day 1: Feb 17
sections.content:
| Metric | Value |
|--------|-------|
| Signups | 12 |
| Paid conversions | 2 |
| Conversion rate | 16.7% |

| Paid conversions | 3 |
| Conversion rate | 20.0% |

experiment.hypothesis: Removing free tier increases paid conversion
